discourse_list.title: Informal Poll: Should we hold a Governance and Risk Call next week? (During DevCon)

content.content: Title says most of it but just in case: Next week is DevCon! Many CU members will be in Bogota meaning we’re unlikely to have a full crowd during the call. GovAlpha is prepared to host and maintain the call next week if we have enough participants to make it happen. So, if we host a call next week (2022-10-13 @17:00 UTC) will you show up? Please only vote yes if you plan to attend AND think we can still have a worthwhile call.    Should we host a Governance and Risk call next week during DevCon?  Yes No Abstain/Don’t Care     0 voters
content.GPT-summary: The author is asking for feedback on whether to hold a Governance and Risk call during DevCon. They are asking for participants to vote on whether they plan to attend and if they think the call will be worthwhile.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
